Controller Module¶

Controller Module¶

class Controller.Controller[source]¶

Bases: object

The controller handles the instances of the classes the user input.

__init__()[source]¶
add_worker()[source]¶

a worker instance gets created, started and added to the list in the model :return: None

delete_worker(id)[source]¶

delete a certain worker :param id: the unique identifier of the worker who gets deleted :return: None

disable_enable_logging()[source]¶

disable or enable logging, depending on whether logging has already been enabled or disabled :return: None

disable_enable_worker(id)[source]¶

disable or enable a worker, depening on whether the certain worker is already enabled or disabled :param id: the unique identfier of the worker which gets enabled or disabled :return:

print_all_workers()[source]¶

print the information of all workers :return: None

print_worker_information(id)[source]¶

prints the information of a certain worker :param id: the unique identifier of the worker whose information gets printed :return: None

set_agent_based()[source]¶

set the current load balancing method AgentBasedAdaptiveBalancing :return: None

set_least_connection()[source]¶

set the current load balancing method to LeastConnection :return: None

set_time_interval(time)[source]¶

delegate the parameter to the function of the TaskDispatcher since the time-interval is defined there :param time: the amount of time inbetween each dispatch of a task :return: None

class Controller.TaskDispatcher[source]¶

Bases: threading.Thread

The TaskDispatcher is a thread which delegates a task every x seconds to the LoadBalancer

__init__()[source]¶
run()[source]¶

in a while true loop, call the distribute method of the unknown load balancer with the load the load is a number which gets incremented each time it loops :return: None

set_load_balancer(lb)[source]¶

set the load balancer method :param lb: the load balancer object which gets set :return: None

set_time_interval(time)[source]¶
Parameters:time – the amount of time inbetween each dispatch of a task
Returns:None
Controller.find_worker(id)[source]¶

static method which returns a worker object which gets found by the identifier :param id: the unique identifier by which the worker gets found :return: a worker object
